nodes.text: Windows were transparent glass panes in use on houses throughout the galaxy. They were generally covered over by curtains—or, alternatively, shutters—when the house's inhabitants did not want others looking inside their homes, or when it was nighttime. Some windows were cleaned by CLE-004 window cleaning droids.

There were trillions of windows on Coruscant, most of which were composed of clari-crystalline or glass rather than more durable transparisteel, and thus, breakage was common. The bounty hunters Bossk and Zuckuss leapt from a third-story casino window after a failed attempt to acquire the bounty on Nil Posondum.
